attributes.action: STOP THE RIGHTS TO REMOVE A PERSON OR CHILD
attributes.additional_details:
Stop with this nonsense this is wrong to be able to remove a person or child 
And we the people do not consent 
We all know your plans and they arent working so I suggest that you stop this bs or we will put in action to remove the government completely
attributes.background: The government have put a legislation out that gives right that your child can be taken from you and can happen whilst your child is at school

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions that request a clear action from the Government, and it's not clear what action you want the Government to take.

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to change the rules about when children are taken into care, if that is what you want to change.
